page.shortlink: api desktop api a5 object browse enum function
page.description: The A5.BROWSE_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all saved browses.

prototypes.prototype: Next_Object_Name as C = A5.BROWSE_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Object_List
argument.description: A list of browses in various formats, depending on the Flag variable.

argument.name: Next_Object_Name
argument.description: The next browse in the list of browses.

item.name: Null = Object name, full path, and filename.
4 = Object type, Object name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted Object name, full path, and filename.
12 = Object type, quoted Object name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of a browse.
